snippet: Adopting rigorous standards, and sticking with them while giving teachers some breathing room, has helped Massachusetts’ students rise to No. 1 in the nation on science and math achievement.
abstract: Adoption of rigorous science and math teaching standards in Massachusetts, and an adherence to them even when early results were disappointing, has helped state's students rise to No 1 in nation in science and math achievement.
lead_paragraph: Adopting rigorous standards, and sticking with them while giving teachers some breathing room, has helped Massachusetts’ students rise to No. 1 in the nation on science and math achievement.

headline.main: Expecting the Best Yields Results in Massachusetts
headline.print_headline:
One State
Had a Plan
And Saw It
Through
